name: Tooltip
description: The Tooltip component is primarily meant to enhance the UX for various and additional information.

props.name: children
props.doc: Provide a string or a React Element to be shown as the tooltip content.

props.name: active
props.doc: Controls visibility. When provided, Tooltip is controlled and ignores DOM events (hover/focus/touch). `true` keeps it visible; `false` keeps it hidden.

props.name: position
props.doc: Defines the offset position to the target element the arrow appears. Can be `top`, `right`, `left` and `bottom`. Defaults to `top`.

props.name: align
props.doc: Defines the offset alignment to the target element the arrow appears. Can be `center`, `right` and `left`. Defaults to `center`.

props.name: arrow
props.doc: Defines the direction where the arrow appears. Can be `center`, `top`, `right`, `bottom` and `left`. Defaults to `center`.

props.name: portalRootClass
props.doc: CSS class name applied to the portal root element. Used to style or identify the portal container.

props.name: skipPortal
props.doc: Skip rendering the tooltip in a React Portal. When `true`, the tooltip renders inline in the DOM tree instead of being portaled to document.body. Useful for cases where you need the tooltip to be part of the same DOM hierarchy for styling or event handling. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: keepInDOM
props.doc: Keep the tooltip portal mounted in the DOM even when closed. When `true`, the tooltip remains in the DOM when inactive. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: omitDescribedBy
props.doc: Set to `true` to omit the `aria-describedby` attribute on the target element. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: showDelay
props.doc: Define the delay until the tooltip should show up after the initial hover / active state.

props.name: hideDelay
props.doc: Define the delay until the tooltip should disappear up after initial visibility.

props.name: size
props.doc: Defines the spacing size of the tooltip. Can be `large` or `basis`. Defaults to `basis`.

props.name: targetElement
props.doc: Provide an element directly as a React Node or a React Ref that will be wrapped and rendered.

props.name: targetSelector
props.doc: Specify a vanilla HTML selector by a string as the target element.

props.name: triggerOffset
props.doc: Adjust the pixel gap between the tooltip content and its trigger. Use positive values to place the tooltip further away (e.g., to match custom spacing). Defaults to `16`.

props.name: noAnimation
props.doc: Set to `true` if no fade-in animation should be used.

props.name: fixedPosition
props.doc: If set to `true`, the Tooltip will be fixed in its scroll position by using CSS `position: fixed;`. Defaults to `false`.
